attributes.title: Cheeto colored fever dream
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app, me, my whole family, all my ancestors, and all my descendants turned racist. Thankfully I awoke from the Cheeto colored fever dream and immediately deleted the app. My whole family, all my ancestors, and all my descendants cried and thanked me. Do your part. Don’t be racist.

attributes.title: death by app
attributes.review: i downloaded this app because i thought it was a game. turns out that it’s not. every time i would have it open in public it would say horrible racial slurs and terribly sexist remarks at people as i walked by. people kept thinking it was me so i would regally get punched. i had to go to the hospital because of all the punches to the face but sadly the doctor was a women and my phone just kept saying “grab her by her p*ssy”. she refused service so now i’m dead and can’t delete the app.

attributes.title: This app killed my dog
attributes.review: My dog and I were looking what cool merch oompa loompa boy had and when we were on the Checkout place we saw the price and gave my DOG A STROKE. I can’t believe this website is so toxic that it killed our family pet!!! I want this removed now and safe other fellow animals!!

attributes.title: How bout no
attributes.review: I wanted to download a good political app but as soon as I opened it I got calls saying I’ll be dead by dawn and texts saying a cheeto man is watching me through my phone. All of a sudden I had a seizure!! Thank you but I don’t feel like dying from a racist/child rapist/run by a orange man app. 😙✌🏻

attributes.title: EEEEEWWWWWW
attributes.review: This app is pretty much useless and is a waste of 5 seconds it took to download. I don’t recommend this app to anyone unless you are my racist aunt. Sure she would love this gross app. You might lose brain cells when you first open the app because you see the Cheeto man 😡🤮🤢😾👎👎👎👎

attributes.title: Ugh
attributes.review: This is an app for people who support a racist orange Oompa Loompa looking man idk why people even support him and this app made my phone glitch so so much I had to pay a lot off money to get it fixed and everything in my house was breaking when I got this app 😡😤

attributes.title: Absolutely no
attributes.review: I opened the app to see a Cheeto... working out. Wasn’t pleasant. Never in my right mind am I ever getting apps like this. I don’t even support him. Did I download it to see what it’s about? Yes. Yes I did. Did I like it? No. No I didn’t. I’m uninstalling and never redoweloading again!!!

attributes.title: Horrible app 🤕😒
attributes.review: This app is horrible it doesn’t function properly i download this app so I could try to see the other side and instead it kept giving me penis enlarging pill advertisements also it kept giving me a Cheeto brand spray tanner 🤢🤮😷

attributes.title: disturbing and violating 🤦🏼‍♀️💅🏻💕
attributes.review: i find this app to be extremely inconsiderate and disturbing. who would want to open an app the see dOnAlD tRuMpS face?? no body exactlyyyyy. after opening this app i will be deleting it immediately and i will recommend other do too.

attributes.title: Absolutely horrendous🤢🤮
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible it scared my pet fish half to death!! The app made absolutely no sense it displayed pigs and Cheetos all over it! I feel offended that the App Store would allow this DISGUSTING app to roam free for anyone to download, sickening😡😡😡!! Who would even download this app anyways it’s boring🥱
